name: 11th Zambia International Mining and Energy Conference and Exhibition
content: The 11th edition of ZIMEC 2023 will take place at Kitwe, the center of Zambiaâ€™s mining industry 1-2 November 2023\. ZIMEC is the longest-running government-supported mining and energy event in Zambia. Organized by AME Trade and Supported by the Ministry of Mines and Mineral Development and the Ministry of Energy.
